## Gui3D.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Gui3D` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(options?: Gui3DOptions);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [Gui3DOptions](./verse-three-ui.gui3doptions.md) | _(Optional)_ |

## Example


```ts
const gui3d = new Gui3D({

})
```
